title: 10th Floor Unit Available on First Hill with Fantastic View!
posting_body: Schedule a tour online here: https://showdigs.co/7sxfwi or by submitting the Contact Us form!
Great opportunity to move to First Hill with excellent NW view of the city and Sound!
Unit features an oversized living room which can easily accommodate a home office along with your standard fixings.
Kitchen boasts cherry floors, granite counters, and high-end SS appliances.
Tons of storage available in the unit with several large closets.
Rooftop amenity space features 360 views of the City, Sound, and Mountains.
Unit comes with the best parking space in the building in secured garage.
Laundry located on same floor, just a couple doors down the hall.
Enjoy all the amenities the City has to offer!
COMMUNITY NAME:
The Decatur
YEAR BUILT: 1950
COMMUNITY FEATURES
Secured Community Garage | Free Laundry | Rooftop Observation Deck
SCHOOLS
Elementary: Lowell | Middle/Jr High: Meany | High: Garfield
APPLIANCES
Oven/Range | Refrigerator | Dishwasher | Microwave | Community Laundry on Same Floor
PARKING
Reserves space #1 - Secured Garage
HEATING
Electric
UTILITIES INCLUDED
Water | Sewer | Trash
LEASE DETAILS
12 Month or greater with approval
STANDARD DEPOSIT
Our Standard Move in Deposit and Fees include a Refundable Deposit of $2050.
We may ask for Last Month's Rent based on income, credit score, or background check results.
PET POLICY – Case by Case
IF Pets ARE Accepted, the following policy applies:
• Pet is possible with prior approval
• Pet must be over 2 years old
• Pet must neutered or spayed
• Pet must be and under 30lbs
• No aggressive breeds
• Other restrictions may apply
• Pet application fees are $50 per pet.
Monthly pet administration fees are $25 per pet.
• Our Standard Refundable Pet Deposit is $500 per pet (may vary).
This deposit would be in addition to the standard security deposit and is refundable subject to property condition on move out.
EASY TO APPLY ONLINE!
$48 - Per Applicant paid online with a credit card!
